acceptance_criteria: Energy scale functional with visual feedback
Pattern insights generated from user data
Session lengths adapt to user behavior
Family features working with privacy controls

expo_configuration.build_config: EAS Build with platform-specific API keys

energy_check_in.implementation: Custom slider component with haptic feedback, visual state indicators, data persistence to encrypted SQLite
energy_check_in.performance_targets: Sub-100ms response time for immediate feedback

visual_task_flows.implementation: react-native-gesture-handler for drag-drop, react-native-svg for visual elements, Zustand for state management
visual_task_flows.performance_targets: 60fps during drag operations, optimized for complex task trees

ai_pattern_learning.implementation: Local ML processing with TensorFlow Lite, pattern analysis algorithms, encrypted result storage
ai_pattern_learning.performance_targets: Pattern analysis completion within 2 seconds, minimal battery impact

unit_tests.coverage_target: 85% minimum for business logic and ADHD-specific features
unit_tests.tools: Jest with React Native Testing Library

critical_flows: User onboarding to first focus session
Energy check-in to AI task recommendation
integration_tests.tools: Detox for React Native E2E testing
integration_tests.device_coverage: iOS 15+ and Android API 24+ across multiple screen sizes

accessibility_testing.requirements: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance with ADHD-specific accommodations
accessibility_testing.validation_tools: iOS Accessibility Inspector, Android Accessibility Scanner, manual ADHD user testing

performance_testing.load_testing: Extended focus sessions, large task databases, multiple pattern analysis operations

code_quality_standards.documentation_standards: Comprehensive JSDoc for all public APIs, README with ADHD-specific setup instructions, architectural decision records
code_quality_standards.version_control: Git flow with feature branches, semantic versioning, conventional commits for clear changelog generation

build_configuration.development: Expo development build with debug symbols, all logging enabled, sandbox RevenueCat configuration
build_configuration.staging: EAS preview build with production-like settings, staging Firebase environment, internal testing distribution
build_configuration.production: EAS production build with optimizations, release RevenueCat configuration, store distribution ready

pre_release_checklist: All tests passing with required coverage

store_submission.review_preparation: Demo video showcasing ADHD-specific features, review notes explaining adaptive AI behavior

monitoring_setup.analytics: Firebase Analytics with custom ADHD engagement events, conversion funnel tracking
monitoring_setup.crash_reporting: Firebase Crashlytics with proper symbolication for production debugging
monitoring_setup.performance_monitoring: Firebase Performance with custom traces for focus session quality, AI processing time
monitoring_setup.subscription_analytics: RevenueCat dashboard integration for revenue and churn analysis

roles_needed.responsibilities: Core app implementation, state management, native module integration
roles_needed.skills_required: TypeScript, React Native, Expo SDK, mobile UI patterns
roles_needed.adhd_considerations: Understanding of cognitive load principles and neurodivergent design patterns

roles_needed.responsibilities: Pattern learning algorithms, recommendation engine, performance optimization
roles_needed.skills_required: Machine learning, data analysis, TensorFlow Lite, algorithm optimization
roles_needed.adhd_considerations: Knowledge of ADHD behavioral patterns and executive function challenges

roles_needed.responsibilities: Test planning, accessibility validation, performance testing, device compatibility
roles_needed.skills_required: Mobile testing, accessibility standards, automation tools, performance analysis
roles_needed.adhd_considerations: Experience testing for neurodivergent users and cognitive accessibility

timeline_estimates.store_ready_release: 20 weeks including testing, review, and launch preparation

user_experience_kpis: Pattern insight generation within 24 hours of sufficient data
business_kpis: Support ticket volume <5% of monthly active users
